actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require lenders of student loans to notify borrowers of any assignment or transfer of their loans, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require each eligible lender to which any loan under the Robert T. Stafford Student Loan Program is assigned or otherwise transferred to notify the borrower of such assignment or transfer within 15 days after it occurs. Requires specified information to be included in such notice.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require lenders of student loans to notify borrowers of any assignment or transfer of their loans, and for other purposes.
